string.name: name
string.value: The Clue to Ellinia's Burglary Case
#b#@1032001:##k in #bEllinia#k says there has been a huge burglary case in the village. Let's talk to him.
Let's go find #b#@1032104:##k in #bEllinia#k and ask her about the #rGolden Feather#k.
#b#@1032104:##k in #bEllinia#k says she's not sure what the #rGolden Feather#k is.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 2000 Able to proceed to 'This Feather, For Some Reason, Seems To Be Related to Perion...' as next quest.
There is a huge vault I made in #bEllinia#k.\nThe living cost isn't too high, so we don't need that much Mesos to maintain our lifestyle here, but we need those Mesos for town development.

So, the townspeople store their Mesos in that vault and I usually manage it, but all the Mesos are gone!\n\nI'm beyond angry, but what can I do? We do have some clues that may point to the person responsible for this crime, though. Will you help me?

There was a #rGolden Feather#k near the vault, placed right where it's very visible as if someone meant to put it there.\n\nCould you go over to #bEllinia#k and ask #b#p1032104##k what this #rGolden Feather#k is and where it came from? She knows a lot of things, so she may know something about this.
Aren't you going to talk to me again in just a few moments? Why don't you just accept now?
What is this weird looking #rGolden Feather#k?
Please give me a few more minutes to look into it.
